explanation: [0-0] On a mountain top, a mountain biker in red attire is on his bike, ready to descend. A wooden path stretches down the grassy slope, flanked by many spectators. Several cars are parked at the foot of the mountain.

[0-2] The biker starts his descent, riding past the seated spectators and onto the wooden path. Spectators on both sides raise their phones to film him. The path is interrupted at some points by large black rocks.

[0-2] The biker starts his descent, riding past the seated spectators and onto the wooden path. Spectators on both sides raise their phones to film him. The path is interrupted at some points by large black rocks.

[2-8] The biker lands on the rocks and returns to the wooden path. As he rides off the path, the mountain bike loses control and skids into the grove of trees ahead. The biker is thrown from the bike and ends up kneeling on the ground beside his red mountain bike.

[8-11] Finally, the biker gets up and lifts his bike. Just then, a person in grey slides down the same path on foot.
